vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.17.19;
son of: Abraham (H0085) and Sarah (H8283);
half-brother of: Ishmael (H3458), Zimran (H2175), Jokshan (H3370), Medan (H4091), Midian (H4080), Ishbak (H3435) and Shuah (H7744); married to Rebekah (H7259);
father of: Esau (H6215) and Israel (H3478)
Another spelling of yits.chaq (יִצְחָק "Isaac" H3327)
§ Isaac = "he laughs"
son of Abraham by Sarah his wife and father of Jacob and Esau
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Abraham; padre de Jacob
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以撒 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "他笑了"
亞伯拉罕及撒拉的兒子,以掃及雅各的父親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以撒 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "他笑了"
亚伯拉罕及撒拉的儿子,以扫及雅各的父亲
